description: Resumes activity on a fleet that was suspended with StopFleetActions. Currently, this operation is used to restart a fleet's auto-scaling activity.  To start fleet actions, specify the fleet ID and the type of actions to restart. When auto-scaling fleet actions are restarted, Amazon GameLift once again initiates scaling events as triggered by the fleet's scaling policies. If actions on the fleet were never stopped, this operation will have no effect. You can view a fleet's stopped actions using DescribeFleetAttributes. Operations related to fleet capacity scaling include:    DescribeFleetCapacity     UpdateFleetCapacity     DescribeEC2InstanceLimits    Manage scaling policies:    PutScalingPolicy (auto-scaling)    DescribeScalingPolicies (auto-scaling)    DeleteScalingPolicy (auto-scaling)     Manage fleet actions:    StartFleetActions     StopFleetActions
